verses.verse: My son <WH1121>, if you will receive <WH3947> my words <WH561>, and hide <WH6845> my commandments with you <WH4687>;
So that you incline <WH7181> your ear <WH241> unto wisdom <WH2451>, and apply <WH5186> your heart <WH3820> to understanding <WH8394>;
Yes <WH7121>, if you cry after knowledge <WH998>, and lift up <WH5414> your voice <WH6963> for understanding <WH8394>;
If you seek <WH1245> her as silver <WH3701>, and search <WH2664> for her as for hidden treasures <WH4301>;
Then shall you understand <WH995> the fear <WH3374> of the Lord <WH3068>, and find <WH4672> the knowledge <WH1847> of God <WH430>.
For the Lord <WH3068> gives <WH5414> wisdom <WH2451>: out of his mouth <WH6310> comes knowledge <WH1847> and understanding <WH8394>.
He lays up <WH6845> sound wisdom <WH8454> for the righteous <WH3477>: he is a shield <WH4043> to them that walk <WH1980> uprightly <WH8537>.
He keeps <WH5341> the paths <WH734> of judgment <WH4941>, and preserves <WH8104> the way <WH1870> of his saints <WH2623>.
Then shall you understand <WH995> righteousness <WH6664>, and judgment <WH4941>, and equity <WH4339>; Yes <WH2896>, every good path <WH4570>.
When wisdom <WH2451> enters <WH935> into your heart <WH3820>, and knowledge <WH1847> is pleasant <WH5276> unto your soul <WH5315>;
Discretion <WH4209> shall preserve <WH8104> you <WH8394>, understanding shall keep you <WH5341>:
To deliver <WH5337> you from the way <WH1870> of the evil <WH7451> man <WH376>, from the man that speaks <WH1696> perverse things <WH8419>;
Who leave <WH5800> the paths <WH734> of uprightness <WH3476>, to walk <WH3212> in the ways <WH1870> of darkness <WH2822>;
Who rejoice <WH8056> to do <WH6213> evil <WH7451>, and delight <WH1523> in the perverseness <WH8419> of the wicked <WH7451>;
Whose ways <WH734> are crooked <WH6141>, and they are perverse <WH3868> in their paths <WH4570>:
To deliver <WH5337> you from the strange <WH2114> woman <WH802>, even from the stranger <WH5237> which flatters <WH2505> with her words <WH561>;
Which forsakes <WH5800> the guide <WH441> of her youth <WH5271>, and forgets <WH7911> the covenant <WH1285> of her God <WH430>.
For her house <WH1004> inclines <WH7743> unto death <WH4194>, and her paths <WH4570> unto the dead <WH7496>.
None that go <WH935> unto her return again <WH7725>, neither take they hold <WH5381> of the paths <WH734> of life <WH2416>.
That you may walk <WH3212> in the way <WH1870> of good <WH2896> men <WH8104>, and keep the paths <WH734> of the righteous <WH6662>.
For the upright <WH3477> shall live <WH7931> in the land <WH776>, and the perfect <WH8549> shall remain in it <WH3498>.
But the wicked <WH7563> shall be cut off <WH3772> from the earth <WH776>, and the transgressors <WH898> shall be rooted out of it <WH5255>.
